de.iabg.mesh.io
Class ASCIIMeshConnectionReader

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Reader
      java.io.InputStreamReader
          java.io.FileReader
              de.iabg.mesh.io.ASCIIMeshConnectionReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
MeshConnectionReader, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.Readable
public class ASCIIMeshConnectionReader
extends java.io.FileReader
implements MeshConnectionReader

This implementation of MeshConnectionReader parses an ASCII file containing mesh connection data, namely the node connections. Refer to MeshConnectionReader class API for more details.

Version:
September 11, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE

importNodeConnections

public void importNodeConnections(NodeConnectionMatrix connections)
Description copied from interface: MeshConnectionReader
Clears the given node connections and replaces them with the data parsed from the internally stored file. This method should be called after MeshConnectionReader.readFile(), otherwise no data will be saved.

Specified by:
importNodeConnections in interface MeshConnectionReader
Parameters:
connections - the NodeConnectionMatrix where the data will be stored

readFile

public void readFile()
              throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: MeshConnectionReader
Internally saves the data from the file for later use. The format of the lines may be altered as required to more easily parse the file.

Specified by:
readFile in interface MeshConnectionReader
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the file could not be read
